items.item_details:
Attached is the June 9, 2007, Special Board Meeting Agenda (PDF).
	 
	 
Open Session 9:00 A.M. 
Date: Saturday, June 9, 2007 
Time 9:00 A.M. 
Place: East Side Union High School District - Board Room 
	 
Members of the public shall have an opportunity to address the Board of Trustees on the agenda item identified below. (Government Code §Section 54954.3) 
	 
The business to be transacted at the Special Board Meeting shall be limited to the following:

items.item_text: Information explaining Board meeting procedures and how citizens can address the Board will be read. Written information is located near the entrance to the Board Room.
items.item_text_raw: 3.01 Information explaining Board meeting procedures and how citizens can address the Board will be read. Written information is located near the entrance to the Board Room.

items.item_text: For consideration by the Board of Trustees
items.item_text_raw: 4.01 For consideration by the Board of Trustees

meeting_sections.section_name: CONSIDERATION OF PROPOSED AMENDMENTS TO AGENDA

items.item_text: Persons wishing to address the Board must fill out a 'gold' request form, located at the entrance of the Board Room.
items.item_text_raw: 5.01 Persons wishing to address the Board must fill out a 'gold' request form, located at the entrance of the Board Room.

meeting_sections.section_name: PUBLIC MEMBERS WHO WISH TO ADDRESS THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES

items.item_text: Work Session for General Fund Budget for 2006/2007 – Superintendent Bob Nuñez
items.item_text_raw: 6.01 Work Session for General Fund Budget for 2006/2007 – Superintendent Bob Nuñez
